phrase.cizu_name: the tip of an (或 the) iceberg

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: from Dutch ijsberg, from ijs 'ice' + berg 'hill'

entry.tran: 冰山 the tip of the iceberg
entry.def: An iceberg is a large tall mass of ice floating in the sea.

means.word_mean: 1. a large mass of ice floating at sea; usually broken off of a polar glacier
2. lettuce with crisp tightly packed light-green leaves in a firm head;

sentences.sentence: "iceberg is still the most popular lettuce"
